offences.offenceWording:
Has a violent past and fear that he will commit further offences and
                interfere with witnesse

statementOfOffence.legislation: Contrary to byelaw 19 and 31(1) of the Tyne and Wear Metro Byelaws made under sections 58 and 62 of the Tyneside Metropolitan Railway Act 1973.
